name: clickup-clone
description: A full-stack project management application inspired by ClickUp

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist
